items.title: Found Footage Horror ‘Project Butterfly: Flatwoods’ Coming Halloween Night 2025!

• The further the students dig, the more they uncover the terrifying truths of this bunker

items.title: Jane Goodall, legendary primatologist, has died at age 91
bullets: • Jane Goodall, a scientist whose studies of wild chimpanzees made her a household name, has died at the age of 91
• Her groundbreaking discoveries showed just how much chimps are like humans
• "They kiss, embrace, hold hands, pat one another on the back," Goodall said

items.title: What went right this week: ‘a landmark victory for the ocean’, plus more

• If fully implemented, the treaty could establish the largest network of ocean sanctuaries in history

items.title: Hegseth says four killed in US strike on alleged drug boat off Venezuelan coast

items.title: Roland is finally honoring its legacy instead of just cashing in on it
bullets: • Roland was undeniably one of the most innovative companies in music technology during the 1980s and ‘90s
• The TR-1000 is company’s first analog drum machine in over 40 years
• The 808 is arguably the most important instrument since the creation of the electric guitar
• For much of the 2000s the company seemed lost, pumping out forgettable all-digital products
